attributes.title: i don’t recommend✨
attributes.review: the app keeps crashing, doesn’t give any useful info, and what if i don’t want to enter my phone number immediately after downloading?😹 sorry donald, i cant stand too see this app on the app store for any longer 😘❤️

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever seen in my life! Do not let this man be president. Disgusting! My dog could do a better job then him.

attributes.title: Absolutely awful
attributes.review: This application is horrible. I downloaded it in order to support our great American leader, Mr. Cheeto. But unfortunately the app is not as great as our leader.

attributes.title: worst app i have ever used in my life🥱
attributes.review: this app used a lot of racist language and slurs and was very offensive towards black people, hispanics, muslims, and asians. it didn’t provide any helpful information and was just not a good app at all. this app puts down other races and is just all in all disgusting.😡

attributes.title: tikkity tokitty 🥰👑👑👑👑
